fields.name: boundary
fields.description: Optional. The polygon geometry of the zone in WKT or Polygon.

fields.name: super_zone
fields.description: Optional. If there is a hierarchy of zones (e.g., parcels and TAZs), indicates the zone of next higher level.

name: zone.schema.json
description: Locates zones (travel analysis zones, parcels) on a map. Zones are represented as polygons in geographic information systems.
